seng202.group6.controller

Class MainWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.group6.controller.MainWindowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class MainWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Controls the main gui window Has functions used by buttons, combo boxes and all other objects in the main GUI window.

      private class  MainWindowController.ListTreeCell
      Custom tree cell to specify renaming behaviour and context menu for list selection tree view.

      • isMainTab

        private boolean isMainTab(javafx.scene.control.Tab tab)
        Checks whether the given tab is the currently active tab.
        Parameters:
        tab - The queried tab.
        Returns:
        true if the tab is the currently selected tab, false otherwise.

      • isMapTabSelected

        boolean isMapTabSelected()
        Checks if the map tab is currently selected. Used by external classes checking.
        Returns:
        true if the map tab is selected, false otherwise.

      • setUp

        public void setUp(DataContainer dataContainer,
                  PersistenceManager persistenceManager)
        Sets up the controller with the data container used by the program and persistence manager that is used for saving and loading data.

        Initializes elements dependent on data container and cascades data container assignment to included controllers.

        Parameters:
        dataContainer - the data container being used by the program
        persistenceManager - the persistence manager of the program

      • askToSave

        private boolean askToSave()
        Checks whether any changes have been made to the data and if so, asks the user if they wish to save them.
        Returns:
        false if the user cancelled, otherwise return true as the user saved, declined to save, or no changes were made.

      • savePersistent

        private void savePersistent()
        Saves the data to the last loaded/saved file. If the last file does not exist or is inaccessible, calls save as.
